sentences.sentence: Sparky Cosper already has a small exhibition in his honour at Booker Airfield.
sentences.translation: 斯帕西·科斯珀为纪念他在布克机场举行了一次小型展览。

sentences.sentence: Streaming video of Sparky the parakeet .
sentences.translation: 活泼的长尾小鹦鹉视频直播。

sentences.sentence: Last time I checked, Sparky, I still ran this company.
sentences.translation: 我最后再说一次，狗崽子，我仍然掌管着这家公司。
